title: CLARIN Newsflash January 2026 is Out
content: CLARIN Newsflash January 2026 is Out Every month the Newsflash gives an overview of what has been happening at the CLARIN, the national consortia and the wider community. The newsflash also features events, calls and vacancies that are relevant for the CLARIN community. Read the most recent Newsflash: January 2026 Subscribing to it is the ideal way of staying informed. Subscribe here Past issues of the CLARIN Newsflash You are welcome to submit a news item with CLARIN-related news (or call for p...
creator: Elisa Gorgaini
sourceTitle: CLARIN ERIC - Common Language Resources and Technology Infrastructure

title: Centre news vol. 77 - January 2026
content: Centre news vol. 77 - January 2026 Support Text and Data Mining Votes in the European Parliament are coming up with a risk of rendering the  Text and Data Mining exception meaningless, threatening the training and use of Large Language Models. Please be invited to express your concerns by signing this form by 21 January end of the day. CLARIN technical open hour, Monday 26 January at 11:00 CET The next edition of the  technical open hour is planned for Monday 26 January at 11:00 C...
creator: Dieter Van Uytvanck
sourceTitle: CLARIN ERIC - Common Language Resources and Technology Infrastructure
